text: There's water on the East side. It's weird.

elements.text: There's water on the East side. It's weird.

text:
My wife does not understand why this remains so hard for me after over a decade living here. I still routinely get on the pike going the wrong direction because I'm oriented to the ocean.

Also, I'm a little upset that my son is going to grow up thinking the ocean is supposed to be to the east.
